dt: {bc}a line that marks the level of the surface of {a_link|water} on something: such as
{bc}the point on the hull of a ship or boat to which the water rises
{bc}a line marked on the outside of a ship that corresponds with the water's surface when the ship is afloat on an even keel under specified conditions of loading

shortdef: a line that marks the level of the surface of water on something: such as
the point on the hull of a ship or boat to which the water rises
a line marked on the outside of a ship that corresponds with the water's surface when the ship is afloat on an even keel under specified conditions of loading

dt: {bc}the level that water reaches on the side of a ship

dt.t: We repaired the hull below {it}the waterline{/it}.

shortdef: the level that water reaches on the side of a ship
